content: ©2007 asparagus & mayonnaise asparagusmayonnaise blogspot com front post stripes grocery bag holder materials --main color mc 2 5 to 3 oz worsted weight yarn about half a skein of red heart super saver --contrasting color cc approximately 20 yards worsted weight yarn --size g crochet hook --tapestry needle gauge --not too important directions us crochet terms round 1 with mc chain 44 join with slip_stitch in first st being very careful that chain is not twisted do not turn chain 3 this counts as first double_crochet now and throughout double_crochet in each chain around join with slip_stitch to first double_crochet 44 double_crochet round 2 eyelet row chain 4 counts as first chain-1 space skip next double_crochet * double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 skip next double_crochet * around join with slip_stitch to third chain of beg chain 4 22 chain-1 sps round 3 chain 3 double_crochet in next chain-1 space * double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in next chain-1 space * around join with slip_stitch to first double_crochet 44 double_crochet round 4 chain 3 double_crochet in next st and each st around join with slip_stitch to first double_crochet rnds 5-8 repeat round 4 round 9 switch to cc do not cut mc rather leave it behind work and pick it up again at beginning of next round chain 3 fpdtr in double_crochet below next double_crochet skip next double_crochet * double_crochet in next double_crochet fpdtr in double_crochet below next double_crochet skip next double_crochet * around join with slip_stitch to fist double_crochet 44 st round 10 switch to mc chain 3 double_crochet in next fpdtr * double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in next fpdtr * around join with slip_stitch to first double_crochet rnds 11-24 repeat rnds 4-10 twice more rnds 25-28 repeat round 4 round 29 repeat round 2 round 30 repeat round 3 fasten_off weave in ends ©2007 asparagus & mayonnaise asparagusmayonnaise blogspot com handle row 1 using mc join with slip_stitch to 11th double_crochet chain 50 st st in 33rd double_crochet making sure chain is not twisted row 2 turn single_crochet in each chain to end join with slip_stitch in 11th double_crochet fasten_off weave in ends drawstrings make 2 chain 100 fasten_off make sure both ends are securely knotted beg in 11th chain-1 space of top eyelet row use tapestry needle to weave drawstring through eyelet cut yarn ends to approx 1 in draw up and tie in a bow repeat for bottom eyelet row you will probably want the top drawstring fairly loose and the bottom one tighter fill with plastic grocery bags and hang stand back and admire your work
